website_summaries.verdict: 1More's first attempt at a gaming headset is visually striking and sounds very good, but without a real boom microphone the voice chat quality suffers.
cons: Pinhole microphone instead of boom mic hurts voice quality

customer_reviews.title: Premium set
customer_reviews.text: Premium headphones. Looks like every detail was thought through including software. Ear cups are very comfortable and flexy adjust in every way. Microphone rod looks just cool and works really well. There are two microphones on the end to deal with NC function. Bunch of options in the app. On top the packaging is very luxurious, would do as perfect gift. I use it on my PC and PS4. Price is a bargain for such a set. Definitely 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great for PS4
customer_reviews.text: My husband started to play on his PS4 again, but with a little child it was important to maintain low noise levels. That is way I turned to Amazon in search for gaming headphones. I showed him several options and my husband picked this one. After using it for a week he couldn't be more happy (I'm happy too, I can't hear any gunshots in the house :)). The sound is superb as well a comfort and overall quality of this product. I know that such good headphones are very pricey on the high street (starting from £80), so this half price alternative will serve us well.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great fancy headset
customer_reviews.text: The packaging gave me very impressive thoughts and expectations. They fit perfectly and are very comfortable around the ears. IThey cancelled out the surrounding noise great.The knob for volume AND bass toggling is perfect for switching games and/or to watch videos. The icing on the cake is the customizable LED lights for the headset. I like red, but there are multiple colors for any mood/look you want. Very pleased and would buy the next pair they come out with.
customer_reviews.author: Zombie

customer_reviews.title: Look brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic packaging, my first thought was if they perform as well as they look the were onto a winner. Unpacked, downloaded driver and connected to my pc Easy set up opened spotify and off we went Very good crystal clear sound and nice led set on breath , good deep Base Very happy with these
customer_reviews.author: p m Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this second pair as a gift. If you are after good quality for not too high price. This is it
customer_reviews.author: Kashi

customer_reviews.title: 1More Please No
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product I ever bought in my life ... From the sound to the software , everything is just terrible Please 1More make it simple Just no no no ... The software is just useless for gaming ... And that fake 7.1 surround sound OMG 😲 .No No No
customer_reviews.author: Oz Group

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset!
customer_reviews.text: This headset exceeded my expectations! They fit perfectly and are very comfortable around the ears. I typically play Fortnite on PS4, and these were amazing. They cancelled out the surrounding noise great, and sound quality was excellent. The knob for volume AND bass toggling is perfect for switching games and/or to watch videos. The icing on the cake is the customizable LED lights for the headset. I like red, but there are multiple colors for any mood/look you want. Very pleased and would buy the next pair they come out with.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D.

customer_reviews.title: High Pitch Buzzing that Changes Frequency
customer_reviews.text: I plug them in and they work fine but in the background i hear buzzing, when i stop the music they continue to buzz when i speak the buzzing changes pitch. My guess is it's the noise canceling, but it gives me a head ache
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: Nice, comfortable, but wished there was more customization with colors.
customer_reviews.text: I would've gave this a 5 stars but the software and headset would mess with my computer once a while. Sometimes I would suddenly have a error occur during a youtube music session or my computer would freeze. I have a i7 7700k with 16 gb ram all the works of a gaming computer. But I have got to say that it is very comfortable and I love the design of it overall. Really nice gaming headset.
customer_reviews.author: Kong Pheng Thao

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, high recommends
customer_reviews.text: In this price range, this headphone performance pretty well, or I can say it’s excellent. The volume is great and accurate for FPS gaming, the mic is great, like the design of mic bar with the sounds effect.
customer_reviews.author: Tonyfan

customer_reviews.title: Driver touches ear
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality and EQ is beyond amazing although the driver was being pushed into my ear making it unbearable to wear
customer_reviews.author: Xiomara

customer_reviews.title: Bass
customer_reviews.text: I am using it for vr and I had to say, they do a wonderful job
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Customer support doesn't work true calling didn't go through
customer_reviews.text: After having these for two weeks I put them in my backpack took them out and the left speaker had came unattached hanging by the cord
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Clear sound and good bass
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these headphones are fantastic quality, both regarding durability and sound quality. They are comfortable, not hurting my ears after extended use. The sound quality is good. However, I was expecting a bit more bass based on the product claims. The sound quality is still worth the price, and the noise cancellation makes gaming more immersive. The microphone works well providing clear audio. Having a volume control and microphone mute built into the headphone is a nice feature. So far I have no complaints. I do wish the audio had more bass, but the price is fairly marked despite that.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Paradis

customer_reviews.title: I Do Love These Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Comfort is great. Setup was very easy. The controls are easily accessible while wearing them even for someone with large hands. But the noise cancelling was more impressive than the other three pairs of noise-cancelling headphones I have. Our golden retriever snores...LOUDLY. Usually noise-cancelling technology can't handle low frequencies as well as they can handle blocking high frequencies. These do cancel low frequencies better than anything I have. They are great on planes as well. And I have not been asked to turn my music down in a crowed room/plane. It's like they have a tube going inside my ear to pass sound through. The microphone produces very good sound.
customer_reviews.author: Typical Geek

customer_reviews.title: Solid Gaming Headset
customer_reviews.text: A sharply elegant contrast to the over hyped and vastly overrated Beats headset. The 1More is a no bells and whistle honest to god gaming headset that wouldn’t be out of place in a recording studio. Pros: A very solid performer in terms of feedback and audio quality Metallic secondary head wrap guard suspends the headset’s cups well. Cons Somewhat lacking in terms of unique design ethos, the 1More appears to be a slight amalgamation of several brands best design characteristics. The metallic 1More connectors can become a little loose over time.
customer_reviews.author: James John Hollandsworth, M.D.

customer_reviews.title: A great headset for gamers
customer_reviews.text: An excellent value. This headset has the two most important features required in a headset. Sound quality and comfort. High marks for both. The fit is easily customizable and cancels out ambient noise really well. The music and effects are crisp and clear. A really neat feature is that the mic is retractable into the headset itself, keeping it out of the way when you aren't playing online. You would be hard pressed to find a better headset for your money. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Ross

customer_reviews.title: Overrated weird bass
customer_reviews.text: On low volume i would expect it to have a more nicer voice because nothing is really clear unless you turn it up all the way And the bass you can barely hear it under 60% volume but it’s not the type of bass you would expect it’s a weird kind made by the drivers and it’s more of like vibration from them then actual crisp bass so if you want something with nice bass go for some turtle beach stealth 700 yes the price is different but there are way too over rated for what they are.
customer_reviews.author: Hippopotamuses

customer_reviews.title: Driver download failed(virus detected)- Sounds like a $3 headphones
customer_reviews.text: I hold multiple products of 1more brand and they all are doing great except this 1MORE Spearhead VR Gaming Over-Ear Headphones. I just got my order and tried to test it. 1) This headphones sound likes a $3 headphones with no bass. All I can hear is voice in music videos. No beat or bass. 2) The volume button is not doing anything. It might be malfunctioned or whatever..it is not working. I can not increase or decrease volume. 3)Not able to download it's driver software from 1More website as it says it has virus and download has failed(please see the attached screenshot) Overall, highly disappointed with this headphone's performance.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Superior Comfort & Sound
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at how comfortable these headphones are. Sound quality is excellent. I use them for entertainment as well as gaming and am impressed by the quaality overall. The design is simple with no unnecessary doo dads that serve only to confuse before breaking. The controls are easy to master when you become accustomed to them. Noise cancelling is more than adequate. They work well with both my PC and laptop. and provide superior sound on my Android phone. The phones's sound is not the best to begin with but these proide a vast improvement. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Antigone Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent closed back headset when used over usb
customer_reviews.text: this is a really good headset when used over the included usb cable, do not use it over the 3.5mm jack it sounds horrible. The build quality is very good and the sound quality is also very decent. Only buy this if you are looking for a usb headset though.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ball

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and fit
customer_reviews.text: The 1MORE Gaming Headset is perfect for the hardcore gamer in your life. The LED lights can be changed to a color you prefer and the headset is comfortable wearing for hours. The sound quality rivals the more expensive brands and you can't beat this price! Overall, we are happily satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lasha

customer_reviews.title: broke on day 1
customer_reviews.text: This broke immediately, within the first day. The cable to the PC simply came undone. Poor quality for such an expensive headset.
customer_reviews.author: Luisa Remy

product_meta.title: 1MORE VR Gaming Over-Ear Headset with Mic, Super Bass 7.1 Stereo Surround Sound, Dual Mic Noise Cancellation and LED Light for PC/IOS/Android Entertain - H1005 Black
product_meta.description:
Style:Over Ear - VR| Color:Black

Get in the game with 1MORE’s Spearhead VR Gaming Headphones. 7.1 surround sound and a 50 mm Maglev Driver offer a hyper-realistic VR gaming & entertainment experience, while ENC dual mic technology ensures communication remains crystal clear. A light stainless steel frame with cushioned suspension band ensures a comfortable fit through extended use. Wire Material- Enameled Copper Wire and Max Power: 20 mW.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER

Christopher Hagen5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent price for excellent productReviewed in the United States on August 25, 2018Style: Over Ear - VRColor: BlackVerified Purchase Amended review - my previous review was based on a poor experience that ended up being mostly my own fault.

First things first - the user manual is not perfectly clear on proper setup - for setup using the software you can download from the website, just don't even unpack the 3.5mm audio jack - use only the USB.

The sound on these things is amazing. Once customized to suit you, and using the 7.1 surround setting, everything is just perfect. I have never heard Pink Floyd or played Overwatch or watched a movie in such immersion before. Using discord and other voice chat or recording services, the mic pickup is clear and loud, and the noise cancelling works great to deaden nearby fans or a TV playing a movie or TV show. Well worth the price.

When the bass hits, you feel it. It's not painful or uncomfortable, but your skin ripples like a stone into a calm body of water. Pressure is not excessive, the headmuffs sit very lightly without pressing down or in very hard. The auto-expanding headrest band is not the most comfortable, but is well padded.

I am very pleased.Read more 10 people found this helpful Helpful Comment Report abuse OJ A.5.0 out of 5 stars You should get the 1MORE Gaming Headset - great features, super comfortable, and sounds amazing.Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2018Style: Over Ear - VRColor: BlackVerified Purchase The first thing I noticed when trying on this headset was how comfortable it feels. I also own a pair of HyperX Cloud gaming headset and my biggest pet peeve with those is how uncomfortable they feel after a long session of gaming.

I figured to be fair I should try to give the 1MORE's a long gaming session to see how they turned out. I have to say after a good few hours of playing Overwatch, this headset was as comfortable as I first put them on.

The noise cancelling mic is superb. My friends on our discord noticed I sounded clearer, I didn't even mention I was trying a new headset. The sound quality in general exceeded my expectation. I was hearing things I wasn't able to hear with other headsets.

I also plan to use this headset when I'm listening to music off my laptop while doing work. Everything just sounds warmer and brighter with the 1MORE's.

If you're a gamer and also want to have a headset where music sounds great in as well then get the 1MORE's. The LEDs are a nice touch as well.Read more 4 people found this helpful Helpful Comment Report abuse Zack Leger3.0 out of 5 stars Interior speaker guard rubs against my earsReviewed in the United States on June 28, 2019Style: Over Ear - VRColor: BlackVerified Purchase The sound quality and software are excellent. More than enough customization to provide any sound you want.

I have two major issues with this product:
1. The padding around the ears is too thin. My ears are in constant contact with the plastic speaker guard, and rub against this plastic mesh causing irritation that is often painful. My ears are average in size, and I have never had this problem with other over the ear headphones.
2. Microphone quality is only alright. It's a big step down from other headphones. Would like to see the next generation of this headset have a true microphone, at least as an option.

Miscellaneous comments:
1. Surround sound is very good for listening to music.
2. Any sort of touch, tap, or rub made against the headset or the headset's wire can easily be heard in the headset.
3. Noise cancellation seems to be nonexistent. The materials alone seal the sound out fine; however, I am unable to notice any sort of noise cancellation.
4. RGB customization is lacking. Can only change the color, cycle between 3 lighting patterns, and turn ALL the lights on or off. I'd like to disable the RGB on the false mic because I find it distracting, but I cannot without turning off all the other lights.
5. I have my own audio setup with Voicemeeter for use with soundboards. For some reason, there is severe stuttering when I pass this headset's mic though Voicemeeter. I've tried changing settings on both my audio software and the headset's application with no improvement.Read more 2 people found this helpful Helpful Comment Report abuse Brandon Nguyen2.0 out of 5 stars Ok headphones with major flawsReviewed in the United States on February 23, 2020Style: Over Ear - VRColor: BlackVerified Purchase The sound is fine but constant creaking from the aluminum backs get annoying. If you move your neck at all, weather it be the cord coming out of the headset or the stiff headband readjusting itself, a booming creaking sound will echo throughout your ear. Even a light tap will cause the headset to make a vibrating noise.

The software brings little to nothing to the table as most of them tend to muddy out important sound ques. Also occasionally the headset will just not work for 4 minutes. Not even unplugging and plugging will fix it. You'll need to just sit there and wait for sound to come back.

The microphone is finicky as it can pick up my keyboard but can barely hear me. I've spent hours adjusting my microphone volume and sensitivity but still have not found a definitive solution. And for some reason what would be 50% volume on one headset will be only 10% volume on this one, which doesn't make sense.

I also have an issue with the comfort, or lack of comfort. I've been this headset constantly over 3 months and I still have issues with the thin padding and hard headband. It feels like the headset just squeezes on my head and the headband just digs into my skull, and after a while the tip of my ears start to hurt from pressing against the plastic. I could readjust the pads to alleviate that issue but doing so will lead to a lessened noise cancellation effect.Read more One person found this helpful Helpful Comment Report abuse Saul5.0 out of 5 stars Everything about these is amazing!Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2018Style: Over Ear - VRColor: BlackVerified Purchase I love these. I also have a pair of $110 dollar Bose headphones and these blow them out of the water in sound quality. They are the same comfortable as the Bose. The 1more are a little more heavy but I don't notice it while wearing them. I like the customizable LED's with their windows app. The mics are good for playing online games with my friends.

I've been comparing these for a few hours to the Bose headphones (listening to flac music files only) and these are much better. I hear a lot more little details in the songs with these. They can get much louder than the Bose. (With the aux cable plugged into a phone or computer theyre not that loud, but when you use the USB cable plugged into a computer they can get crazy loud. 10/100 is about as loud as I ever set them. The noise cancelling is great. Can't hear anything when I'm playing music. I am very impressed in general with these and I would definitely recommend them. I also bought 1more's triple driver earbuds last year and those where great too. 1more is a great company.Read more 2 people found this helpful Helpful Comment Report abuse See all reviews from the United States TOP INTERNATIONAL REVIEWS 
Translate all reviews to English Jay5.0 out of 5 stars My new daily gaming headsetReviewed in the United Kingdom on January 8, 2020Style: Over Ear - VRColor: BlackVerified Purchase I have worn this headset for a period of 8 hours now and this is what I think about it.

Sound - excellent, for the price of £48, the bass and crispness of the audio is very good. The maximum volume is extensive as I am only using a volume of 1/100 (already quite loud for me) on my windows PC. I play computer games such as csgo and enemy footsteps are easily heard.

Noise cancelling - outside noises are less audible when you have the headset on and you pretty much can't hear them at all when you play music

Build - feels sturdy

Comfort - one of the best features, even after 8 hours the material felt great on my ears. The adjustable head band is easy to use so no unnecessary messing around needed. I liked how the headband stretches instead of being one of those adjustable levels headbands.

Microphone - pretty clear and no static but all in all quite average. I've used audio chat with some friends and they said it was decent. I wish the microphone was a moveable component such as on many other headsets and took the place of the LED stick (which doesn't really have a useful function) so my voice could be clearer. The LED stick either remains a constant colour (microphone off) or lights up when you speak (microphone on). I guess the flashing would be distracting for others around you but personally you wouldn't be able to see it.

The software to change the LED and use the special XEAR functions (surround sound, audio clarity etc.) can be downloaded from the usa 1more website. In my opinion they're not that good and I disabled all of them. Also, I think the software messes up the mic quality through the environmental sound cancelling option so you might want to turn that off.

Overall, a very good headset for this price and it will serve as my daily gaming headset from now onRead more 6 people found this helpful Helpful Sending feedback...Thank you for your feedback.Sorry, we failed to record your vote. Please try again Report abuse Michal Wolek5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable and stylish gaming headsetReviewed in the United Kingdom on March 27, 2020Style: Over Ear - VRColor: BlackVerified Purchase Pros:

Comfortable - I've been wearing it for hours and my ears have not started aching yet, not even once. That was always the problem for me with over-ear headphones, and these fit just great.

Stylish - They look great. The LED colours look nice and vibrant. They can also be turned off for more professional setting, when you might need to be video-conferencing for work. They are not overly gamified, so they do not stand out much with the lights off.

USB/AUX - Can be used both with a USB connection, providing additional features like the LED control and some effects, using the designated software, and with an AUX connection when you just want to connect them to your phone or tablet.

Cons:

Drivers - Not included in the box, but that's understandable, as hardly anyone has a CD drive anymore, but there was also no working link to download the drivers reliably. Fortunately I was able to find them on the official website by just Googling the model and scrolling all the way down on the website. Had some hiccups when installing the software first time, but got them working no issues the second time.

Neutral:

For some reason, the microphone does not want to work on my laptop and only works on my desktop PC, but this might be the issue either with the laptop or my USB-C dongle, so I am not counting this, as they work perfectly on my desktop PC with direct USB connection.

Overall these are great headphones, especially for the price, and I am very happy with these. I was finally able to retire my old headset and pass it on for my brother!Read more Helpful Sending feedback...Thank you for your feedback.Sorry, we failed to record your vote. Please try again Report abuse davide1.0 out of 5 stars AUDIO IMBARAZZANTEReviewed in Italy on December 29, 2019Style: Over Ear - VRColor: BlackVerified Purchase Premetto che avevo visto una ventina di recensioni fra cui su yotube che ne parlavano in maniera entusiata e che pensavo fosse un prodotto premium, appena arrivano ,apro , o meglio tolgo la busta di plastica (si niente pacco amazon)e noto il packaging stupendo che mi esalta con entusiasmo le vado a collegare per fare una prima prova con il jack audio al mio samsung s8 configurato per cuffie molto più costose...e noto che si sentono non male..MALISSIMO.. Immaginate le peggiori cuffie cinesi che abbiate mai provate ..peggio! Alchè vado a scaricare una app, quella ufficiale one more che ha anche il lettore integrato e l'equilazzatore.. Riesco a migliorare il suono ma anche così non arriva alla qualità di cuffie cinesi di 20€...con il volume massio imbarazzante. Ok penso sono cuffie pensate per usare la parte usb e con il suo sotfware pc...Allora accendo il pc , windows 10 le riconosce all'istante..penso bene ...vedrai Davide che adesso suoneranno bene...Accendo youtube (ma solo per paragonarle alle cuffie cinesi gaming e non alle sony di 150€) e sento o meglio non sento quasi i bassi...Allora penso va bhe è necessario il software 1more. Vado sul sito consigliato sul foglietto e sul sito...Il sofware è scomparso, nel senso che sul sito europeo non è possibile scaricarlo! Dopo un pò di ricerche su google trovo il sito americano e li c'è il software. Lo scarico e come cerco di installarlo windows mi comunica che è presente un grave virus! Sono un informatico e sono certo che sia un falso positivo per cui aggiungo un eccezione all'antivirus di windows 10 e procedo. Dopo l'installazione mi si para d'avanti un sofwtare fatto malissimo e con difficoltà capisco come si attivano i vari menu (tasto destro sull'icona di speaker ma non c'è alcun tool tip di aiuto per capirlo .vergognoso..io lavoro pe una azienda sofware e un minimo di queste cose ne capisco) Abilito le varie funzioni e ce ne sono tantissime...peccato che più funzioni attivo più l'audio peggiori. I bassi si possono aumentare ma la qualità è vergognosa, i medi e gli alti sono abbastanza buoni , ma davvero i bassi sono solo fastidiosi e questa è una cuffia gaming non una cuffia monitor. Sono davvero sconvolto e voglio sperare che mi sia arrivata una cuffia difettosa ma temo che non sia così. Anche in passato ho ascoltato cuffie simili ma non arrivavano a 30 €..queste costano sul sito americano 100$ ...MA STIAMO SCHERZANDO? A questo punto posso solo pensare che le recensioni siano state pagate ad arte. Mi spiace fare l'ennesimo reso, ma fin quando troverò prodotti scadenti non posso fare altro che restituirli. La cosa più che mi di spiace che dal punto di vista costruttivo le cuffie sono stupende , esteticamente parlando sono bellissime e sono anche comode....ma non c'è altro di positivo. Delusione TOTALE!Read more 2 people found this helpful Helpful Sending feedback...Thank you for your feedback.Sorry, we failed to record your vote. Load more international reviews Marcello5.0 out of 5 stars Una sopresa, cuffie gaming fantastiche.Reviewed in Italy on November 15, 2019Style: Over Ear - VRColor: BlackVerified Purchase Acquistate per scomessa, e vi devo dire che mi hanno sorpreso è molto pure.
Le 1More Spearhead VR usano un design “sospeso”, con la fascia che poggia sulla testa scollegata dall’archetto e in grado di adattarsi alla forma della testa senza regolazioni specifiche. Tale fascia è ricoperta in finta pelle e tessuto, i padiglioni sono realizzati in plastica e sono ricoperti da un disco con scanalature circolari, con una serie di scritte in bianco. Le scritte, insieme ai loghi 1More sull'archetto e all'asta estraibile sul padiglione sinistro, si illuminano grazie ai LED inseriti all'interno. L'asta estraibile non contiene il microfono, ma funge solo da elemento estetico e da indicazione sull'attività del microfono (dal momento che l'illuminazione è attiva in corrispondenza con la rilevazione di suoni).
Nel complesso, la qualità costruttiva delle 1More Spearhead VRX è elevata per un prodotto di questo tipo.
Passiamo al confort, l’imbottitura dei padiglioni sono ricoperti in morbido tessuto che potrebbe sembrare scomodo ma posso assicurarvi che dopo un po anzichè dare fastidio sembre come se si adattassero, in pratica si sopportano benissimo anche dopo lunche sessioni di gioco.
Sul fronte della connettività, le 1More Spearhead VR offrono sia il tradizionale jack da 3,5 mm (TRRS, ovvero a quattro poli) sia la connessione USB tramite micro-USB. Quest'ultima fa sì che sia possibile bypassare la scheda audio interna del computer per sfruttare invece l'elaborazione interna alle cuffie e il relativo software. Il padiglione sinistro ospita, oltre ai due connettori di cui sopra, una rotella per la regolazione del volume e un tasto per accendere o spegnere il microfono. Premendo la rotella si può passare, nel caso di utilizzo dell'ingresso USB, alla regolazione dei bassi, avendo quindi accesso rapido all'equalizzazione.
Il software è la parte centrale di queste cuffie:
esso permette infatti di regolarne tutte le funzionalità, dal colore dei LED (che sono infiniti) fino all'equalizzazione e agli effetti sonori. Il driver, scaricabile dal sito del produttore, include anche la suite di controllo. La schermata principale include la regolazione del volume, dei bassi e del volume del microfono, oltre ai controlli della cancellazione del rumore del microfono.
Il 7.1 virtuale e la chicca di queste cuffie secondo me a questo prezzo non si può chiedere di meglio, vi basterà configurare le impostazioni tramite il software ed il gioco è fatto.
L'impatto sui giochi è grande Ci si sente in mezzo all'azione ed è possibile sentire i nemici alle spalle o ai lati con precisione, posizionandoli nello spazio e avendo quindi un'idea di quali azioni sia necessario compiere.
Il microfono funziona benissmo chi vi sente dall'altra parte vi sentirà chiaro e pulito, grazie anche alla cancellazione del suono.
Nel complesso posso dire che queste cuffie sono davvero ben fatte, appaiono come un prodotto valido per qualità e prezzo.Read more Helpful Sending feedback...Thank you for your feedback.Sorry, we failed to record your vote.
